wave_0_per_point1=ma=ma+(above(bass,1)*3.1415*.01*bass);
wave_0_per_point2=ma=ma-(above(treb,1)*3.1415*.01*treb);
wave_0_per_point3=
wave_0_per_point4=mx=mx+(.0002*cos(ma));
wave_0_per_point5=my=my+(.0002*sin(ma));
wave_0_per_point6=
wave_0_per_point7=mx=if(above(mx,.9),(.9-mx),mx);
wave_0_per_point8=my=if(above(my,.9),(.9-my),my);
wave_0_per_point9=mx=if(below(mx,.1),(.9+mx),mx);
wave_0_per_point10=my=if(below(my,.1),(.9+my),my);
wave_0_per_point11=
wave_0_per_point12=x=mx;
wave_0_per_point13=y=my;
wave_0_per_point14=
wave_0_per_point15=a=(above(bass+mid+treb,.8));

wave_1_per_point2=ma=ma-(above(mid,1)*3.1415*.05*mid);

wave_2_per_point4=mx=mx+(.0004*cos(ma));

wave_2_per_point7=mx=if(above(mx,.9),(.9-mx),mx);

wave_2_per_point9=mx=if(below(mx,.1),(.9+mx),mx);

wave_3_per_point1=ma=ma+(above(bass,.5)*3.1415*.02*bass);
wave_3_per_point2=ma=ma-(above(treb,.5)*3.1415*.02*treb);
wave_3_per_point3=
wave_3_per_point4=mx=mx+(.0008*cos(ma));
wave_3_per_point5=my=my+(.0008*sin(ma));
wave_3_per_point6=
wave_3_per_point7=mx=if(above(mx,.9),(.9-mx),mx);

wave_3_per_point9=mx=if(below(mx,.1),(.9+mx),mx);

shapecode_0_enabled=0
shapecode_0_sides=5
shapecode_0_additive=1

shapecode_0_x=0.490
shapecode_0_y=0.500
shapecode_0_rad=0.11589
shapecode_0_ang=0.00000
shapecode_0_tex_ang=0.00000
shapecode_0_tex_zoom=4.36077
shapecode_0_r=1.000
shapecode_0_g=0.000

shapecode_0_border_g=1.000
shapecode_0_border_b=1.000
shapecode_0_border_a=0.000
shape_0_per_frame1=x = rand(1000)/1000;
shape_0_per_frame2=y = rand(1000)/1000;
shape_0_per_frame3=ang = rand(150)/100;
shapecode_1_enabled=0
shapecode_1_sides=4
shapecode_1_additive=0
shapecode_1_thickOutline=0
shapecode_1_textured=0

shapecode_3_thickOutline=0
shapecode_3_textured=0

shapecode_3_y=0.500
shapecode_3_rad=0.10000
shapecode_3_ang=0.00000
shapecode_3_tex_ang=0.00000
shapecode_3_tex_zoom=1.00000
shapecode_3_r=1.000
shapecode_3_g=0.000
shapecode_3_b=0.000
shapecode_3_a=1.000
shapecode_3_r2=0.000
shapecode_3_g2=1.000
shapecode_3_b2=0.000
shapecode_3_a2=0.000
shapecode_3_border_r=1.000
shapecode_3_border_g=1.000
shapecode_3_border_b=1.000
shapecode_3_border_a=0.100
per_frame_1=q1 = (cx*2-1) + 0.6*( 0.60*sin(0.374*time) + 0.40*sin(0.294*time) );
per_frame_2=q2 = (cy*2-1) + 0.6*( 0.60*sin(0.393*time) + 0.40*sin(0.223*time) );
per_frame_3=warp = 0;
per_pixel_1=du = (x*2-1) - q1;
per_pixel_2=dv = (y*2-1) - q2;
per_pixel_3=dist = sqrt(du*du+dv*dv);
per_pixel_4=ang2 = atan2(du,dv) + time*0.15;
per_pixel_5=mult = 0.05*sin(dist*0.05);
per_pixel_6=dx = mult*sin(ang2*2-1.5);
per_pixel_7=dy = mult*cos(ang2*2-1.5);
warp_1=`shader_body
warp_2=`{
warp_3=`float2 texpix = texsize.xy * texsize_noise_lq.zw;
warp_4=`float2 dither_uv_big = uv_orig*texpix*0.1;// + rand_frame.xy;
warp_5=`dither_uv_big = dither_uv_big*texpix/(length(dither_uv_big)+0.01)*0.1;
warp_6=`float2 dither_uv = uv_orig*texpix*1.5 + rand_frame.xy;
warp_7=`//uv -= (float2(0,1)*(length(GetPixel(uv)-0.5))*texsize.zw*64) * 0.03;
warp_8=`ret = GetPixel(uv) * 0.7 + 0.15;
warp_9=`ret += (tex2D(sampler_noise_lq, dither_uv_big)-0.5) * 0.05;
warp_10=`ret += (tex2D(sampler_noise_lq, dither_uv)-0.5) * 0.035;
warp_11=`float minchan = min(min(ret.x, ret.y), ret.z);
warp_12=`ret -= minchan;
warp_13=`float maxchan = max(max(ret.x, ret.y), ret.z);
warp_14=`ret /= maxchan + 0.01;
warp_15=`}
comp_1=`shader_body
comp_2=`{
comp_3=`
comp_4=`float2 uv1 = uv-.5;
comp_5=`
comp_6=`float2 hor = float2 (texsize.z,0);
comp_7=`float2 ver = float2 (0,texsize.w);
comp_8=`float3 dx = GetPixel (uv-hor) - GetPixel (uv+hor);
comp_9=`float3 dy = GetPixel (uv-ver) - GetPixel (uv+ver);
comp_10=`float3 dz = (dx + dy) * 0.05;
comp_11=`
comp_12=`float dots = saturate(45.0*(0.294*length(1.0 - dz) - 0.5) + 0.02);
comp_13=`
comp_14=`ret = dots * (1.1 + 0.9 * GetPixel(uv));
comp_15=`float4 noise2 = tex3D(sampler_noisevol_hq, 
comp_16=`                      ((uv.xyy*.7
comp_17=`                       )*texsize.xyy*texsize_noisevol_hq.zww
comp_18=`                      ).xyz*
comp_19=`                      float3(1,1,0)*0.05 + 
comp_20=`                      time*float3(0,0,1)*0.2
comp_21=`                     );
comp_22=`if(ret.x>.3)ret.z*=(noise2)*.2;
comp_23=`if(ret.y>.8)ret.y*=(noise2)*.8;
comp_24=`if(ret.z<.5)ret.x+=(noise2)*1.2; 
comp_25=`}
